title: Of All The Words
author: VD
content_html:
Of all the words
Of screen and pen,
The saddest are these:
Vox was right again.

My account has been deactivated for weeks with all tweets deleted, but that didn’t stop Elon from banning me after some Jewish guy cried to him over my Bible verse tweets.

  • Andrew Torba, 14 December 2022

You may, of course, remember this.

DISCUSS ON SG
